sources.title: Merry Mannequins (1937)
sources.description: Told in a musical-comedy format, this cartoon is the story of two department store mannequins who fall in love, become engaged and plan to marry. When the other dummies/manikins/mannequins in the store learn this, they arrange surprises for the couple with nearly every piece of merchandise in the store coming to life. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/merry-mannequins-1937/

metadata.Plot: Told in a musical-comedy format, this cartoon is the story of two department store mannequins who fall in love, become engaged and plan to marry. When the other dummies/manikins/mannequins in the store learn this, they arrange surprises for the couple with nearly every piece of merchandise in the store coming to life.
metadata.Actors: Homer Hall, Leone Le Doux, Bob Priester
